title: Trade-In Value Dropped from $235 to $170????
content:
I got an offer to trade in my Pixel 2 for Pixel 4a 5G. Went through the trade-in process, and it said my trade-i value would be $235. Went out to lunch and came home... now trade-in value is only $170!!! Tried again, and still the same.

WTF Google?!?!? Crap like this is the reason nobody trusts you.
